languages.text: "Облегчи душу. Твои подельники уже во всем сознались. Покаешься — бить будем только палкой да стрекалом. А будешь упорствовать, так я нож достану".
"Unburden your soul. Your accomplices have already admitted to everything. If you repent, you will only get the stick and the prod. If you try to deny it, I will take out the knife."
languages.original_text: "Облегчи душу. Твои подельники уже во всем сознались. Покаешься — бить будем только палкой да стрекалом. А будешь упорствовать, так я нож достану".

traits.locale_text: "Unburden your soul. Your accomplices have already admitted to everything. If you repent, you will only get the stick and the prod. If you try to deny it, I will take out the knife."
"Unburden your soul. Your accomplices have already admitted to everything. If you repent, you will only get the stick and the prod. If you try to deny it, I will take out the knife."
"Unburden your soul. Your accomplices have already admitted to everything. If you repent, you will only get the stick and the prod. If you try to deny it, I will take out the knife."
"Unburden your soul. Your accomplices have already admitted to everything. If you repent, you will only get the stick and the prod. If you try to deny it, I will take out the knife."
"Unburden your soul. Your accomplices have already admitted to everything. If you repent, you will only get the stick and the prod. If you try to deny it, I will take out the knife."

languages.text: “放下你灵魂中的负担吧，你的同伙已经承认了一切。如果你忏悔，你得到的会是棍棒与鞭子，但你如果打算否认，你得到的将会是刀子。”
languages.original_text: "Unburden your soul. Your accomplices have already admitted to everything. If you repent, you will only get the stick and the prod. If you try to deny it, I will take out the knife."

traits.locale_text: “放下你灵魂中的负担吧，你的同伙已经承认了一切。如果你忏悔，你得到的会是棍棒与鞭子，但你如果打算否认，你得到的将会是刀子。”

languages.text: «Expía tu alma. Tus cómplices ya lo han confesado todo. Si te arrepientes, solo sufrirás la vara... Si tratas de negarlo, tocará sacar el cuchillo».
languages.original_text: "Unburden your soul. Your accomplices have already admitted to everything. If you repent, you will only get the stick and the prod. If you try to deny it, I will take out the knife."

traits.locale_text: «Expía tu alma. Tus cómplices ya lo han confesado todo. Si te arrepientes, solo sufrirás la vara... Si tratas de negarlo, tocará sacar el cuchillo».

languages.text: 「魂の荷物を下ろせ。仲間はすでに全て認めている。悔い改めるなら、棒で叩くだけで許してやろう。否定するというなら、ナイフの出番だな」
languages.original_text: "Unburden your soul. Your accomplices have already admitted to everything. If you repent, you will only get the stick and the prod. If you try to deny it, I will take out the knife."

traits.locale_text: 「魂の荷物を下ろせ。仲間はすでに全て認めている。悔い改めるなら、棒で叩くだけで許してやろう。否定するというなら、ナイフの出番だな」

languages.text: "Entlastet Eure Seele. Eure Komplizen haben bereits alles gestanden. Wenn Ihr bereut, erwarten Euch nur der Stock und der Strom. Solltet Ihr versuchen, zu leugnen, packe ich das Messer aus."
languages.original_text: "Unburden your soul. Your accomplices have already admitted to everything. If you repent, you will only get the stick and the prod. If you try to deny it, I will take out the knife."

traits.locale_text: "Entlastet Eure Seele. Eure Komplizen haben bereits alles gestanden. Wenn Ihr bereut, erwarten Euch nur der Stock und der Strom. Solltet Ihr versuchen, zu leugnen, packe ich das Messer aus."

languages.text: « Soulagez votre âme. Vos complices ont déjà tout avoué. Si vous vous repentez, vous n'aurez droit qu'à quelques coups de bâton. Mais si vous continuez à nier, je sortirai mon couteau. »
languages.original_text: "Unburden your soul. Your accomplices have already admitted to everything. If you repent, you will only get the stick and the prod. If you try to deny it, I will take out the knife."

traits.locale_text: « Soulagez votre âme. Vos complices ont déjà tout avoué. Si vous vous repentez, vous n'aurez droit qu'à quelques coups de bâton. Mais si vous continuez à nier, je sortirai mon couteau. »

languages.text: "Ruhunu arındır. Suç ortakların her şeyi itiraf etti. Tövbe edersen biraz hırpalanıp fırça yediğinle kalırsın. İnkâr edersen bıçağımı çekerim."
languages.original_text: "Unburden your soul. Your accomplices have already admitted to everything. If you repent, you will only get the stick and the prod. If you try to deny it, I will take out the knife."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhunu arındır. Suç ortakların her şeyi itiraf etti. Tövbe edersen biraz hırpalanıp fırça yediğinle kalırsın. İnkâr edersen bıçağımı çekerim."
